scripts.datavore:containerize:amd: docker build --build-arg="APP_DIST=dist/apps/server/datavore" -f docker/prod/server/Dockerfile --platform linux/amd64 -t icedlee337/datavore:amd64 . && echo $DOCKER_PASSWORD | docker login --username $DOCKER_USERNAME --password-stdin && docker push icedlee337/datavore:amd64
scripts.datavore:containerize:arm: docker build --build-arg="APP_DIST=dist/apps/server/datavore" -f docker/prod/server/Dockerfile --platform linux/arm64/v8 -t icedlee337/datavore:arm64v8 . && echo $DOCKER_PASSWORD | docker login --username $DOCKER_USERNAME --password-stdin && docker push icedlee337/datavore:arm64v8
scripts.datavore:deploy: npm run datavore:build && npm run datavore:containerize:arm && npm run datavore:containerize:amd
scripts.bucketvore:containerize:amd: docker build --build-arg="APP_DIST=dist/apps/server/bucketvore" -f docker/prod/server/Dockerfile --platform linux/amd64 -t icedlee337/bucketvore:amd64 . && echo $DOCKER_PASSWORD | docker login --username $DOCKER_USERNAME --password-stdin && docker push icedlee337/bucketvore:amd64
scripts.bucketvore:containerize:arm: docker build --build-arg="APP_DIST=dist/apps/server/bucketvore" -f docker/prod/server/Dockerfile --platform linux/arm64/v8 -t icedlee337/bucketvore:arm64v8 . && echo $DOCKER_PASSWORD | docker login --username $DOCKER_USERNAME --password-stdin && docker push icedlee337/bucketvore:arm64v8
scripts.bucketvore:deploy: npm run bucketvore:build && npm run bucketvore:containerize:arm && npm run bucketvore:containerize:amd
scripts.random: echo 'pass a numeric arg to change the default length of 16' & bun tools/scripts/rando.ts
scripts._release_comment: Use release:patch/minor/major to version, build, commit, tag and publish packages
scripts.release:patch: nx release version patch && npm run release:complete
scripts.release:minor: nx release version minor && npm run release:complete
scripts.release:major: nx release version major && npm run release:complete
scripts.release:commit: git add . && git commit -m "chore(release): v$(node -p "require('./libs/server/common/package.json').version")" || echo 'No changes to commit'
scripts.release:check-version: test $(git diff --name-only | grep -c package.json) -gt 0 || (echo 'ERROR: No version changes detected. Run npm run release:patch/minor/major first!' && exit 1)
scripts.release:complete: npm run release:check-version && npm run release:build && npm run release:commit && npm run release:tag && npm run release:publish
